name: 2022 12th International Conference on Environment Science and Engineering
content: Publication: For papers submitted to ICESE 2022, after the peer reviewing process by at least 2-3 experts, the accepted papers will be published into International Conference proceedings, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Inspec,et al. Selected papers will be considered for publication in Special Issues of peer-reviewed Elsevier journals.
